Description:
Detects remote thread creation in "KeePass.exe" which could indicates potential password dumping activity

Author: Timon Hackenjos
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Remote Thread Created In KeePass.EXE
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where dst_process_path like '%\keepass.exe'
